location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File XXVIII/9 Visits of Foreign Men-of-War to Koweit.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 26 these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains details of a call made by the commander of the French naval vessel La Surpriseto the Political Agent and Ruler of Kuwait.
